title: Unfair chat restriction
body: My entire game i was being harassed and discriminated against and i simply defended myself by telling the person to leave me alone and that they are doing worse than me in the game and then i was chat restricted. I truly feel like this was an unjust punishment for myself. Thoughts?

replies.body: Post chat logs. No one believes thats all you said.

/mute all.
you become the problem when you defended yourself.
defending yourself is always fine, but if you use questionable language, its bannable.
"shut up" is not the same as "shut the fuck up %%%% go kys".
Stop defending yourself. Root of all evil.

1: logs

2: you must have said some something that deserved some punishment, otherwise you wouldn't have been punished

"i was being flamed so I flamed to make the issue worse"

oh yeah?{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Well it depends on how you went about saying that. You must have said something that was reportable. The context of being harassed has no relevance to the automated system.
Riot in a nutshell - You say "afk XD" and they immediately ban you even if it was a joke. Someone leaves and ints and harrass's players and they don't get banned. Literally my games in a nutshell.
